abstract: Death of longtime Oakland Raiders owner Al Davis is a heavy loss for John Madden, television commentator who coached Raiders through most of 1970s and led team to Super Bowl title in 1976.
snippet: John Madden met Al Davis in 1966, and their friendship, forged in football, ran deep.
lead_paragraph: John Madden met Al Davis in 1966, and their friendship, forged in football, ran deep.

headline.main: For Grieving Madden, a Death in the Family
headline.print_headline: For Grieving Madden, A Death in the Family
headline.seo: John Madden Deals With the Loss of His Best Friend
